rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An inviting entrance with a small foyer for transition.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to allow natural light and adhere to Vastu principles (north-east is auspicious).

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Cozy dining space adjacent to living room with minimal window openings for privacy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed along the south wall (considering Vastu's guidelines for cooking areas) with a separate prep area.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom integrated near the living area for convenience and energy efficiency.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window offering ample natural light and ventilation.

metadata.notes: Floor-to-ceiling windows incorporated in living spaces to enhance natural lighting and ventilation while adhering to Vastu and aesthetic requirements.
